name: Looking for girls
description:
When you travel in the forest with your friends,

Accepted a neighbor's commission

Help him find his lost sister

therefore

You are on the way to find.

You have to find her to finish.

Equipment system

Equipment is divided into weapons, shield, head, clothing, accessories

If you have enough money, you can buy it

It can be equipped directly. There are no restrictions

Props system

Props are mainly healing potions

If you have enough money, you can buy it.

Monster system

Monsters will not be shown on the map. Walking on the road will trigger a fight

As long as you buy equipment, you can easily win
